posts.post_content: Hmm, if it had a good upside to it then I would think of things to combo with it but a 3/3 for 4 isn't really worth thinking about for trying to fix it. Hell, if you want some type of good creature for 4 in white just use [calciderm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=calciderm), you don't need to have other cards to make *that* creature good.

posts.post_content:
\*facepalm\*
  
   
Back when I got into Magic again a bit over a year ago, I perused Gatherer to check out what people said about the old sets from my "first era".
  
   
I was pretty shocked how horribad most of Ice age had become. Especially the rares.
  
   
And this dude... Is the epitome.
  
   
Would have been really usable at {1}{W}, but like this, it's a Hill Giant with a downside at RARE.
  
   
Just imagine getting an Ice Age booster today and drawing THIS...
